00021 /**
00022  * @file   GenoSeed.cpp
00023  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00024  * @date   Fri Jun 30 14:44:22 2006
00025  * 
00026  * @brief Abstract interface for a genotyping oracle used for
00027  * genotyping seeds in brlmm. Originally seed calls came from DM, but
00028  * now they are a subject of much research.
00029  * 
00030  */
00031 
00032 #include "chipstream/GenoSeed.h"
00033 
00034 
00035 /** Virtual destructor for virtual class. */
00036 GenoSeed::~GenoSeed()
00037 {
00038 }
00039 
00040 /**
00041  * Figure out the gender of samples based on the number of het calls on
00042  * chromosome X. This is all very human centric...
00043  */
00044 std::vector<affx::Gender> GenoSeed::getGenders() {
00045 
00046   std::vector<affx::Gender> genders;
00047 
00048   /* Loop through and decide if we are male or female. */
00049   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < getChipCount(); i++) {
00050     genders.push_back(getGender(i));
00051   }
00052   return genders;
00053 }
00054 
00055 affx::Gender GenoSeed::getGender(int chip) {
00056   double hetThreshold = .075; // This comes from gtype thresholds.
00057   float hetRate = getHetChrXRate(chip);
00058 
00059   if(hetRate == -1) {
00060     return affx::UnknownGender;
00061   }
00062   else {
00063     if(hetRate < hetThreshold) {
00064       return affx::Male;
00065     }
00066     else {
00067       return affx::Female;
00068     }
00069   }
00070 }
